JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: In-field operations assistant for start-up rental company specialized in vans (Aarhus)
JobPositionInformation.Purpose: Offering a cool part-time job in a omni-tech start-up, that provide flexibility and responsibility. You will work in a dynamic environment with our new department of vans in Aarhus, which is why it is a requirement to live in Aarhus, have a smartphone (for our app) and standard driver's license. The job consists primarily of vans, which must be moved from A to B in Aarhus as well as minor maintenance, such as filling liquids or changing a bulb if needed. In terms of time, approx. 5-10 hours a week, so it can easily be a side job for you next to any. full-time job, study or student job. The salary is 115 DKK an hour.
